description: From Old French damnifier, from Latin damnifico.

verbs.description: damnify (third-person singular simple present damnifies, present participle damnifying, simple past and past participle damnified)

examples: The infectious raines most damnifying the poore saylers, who must be upon the decks to hand in their sailes, abiding the brunt  [â€¦]

entries.meaning: (law) To cause injuries or loss to.
